transcript:
Customer: Hello.

Executive: Haan ji. Ji Brijlal ji, ab aawaz aa rahi hai clear?

Customer: Haan ab aa rahi hai.

Executive: Ji. Dekho, maine aapko ye bola sir, baki sari cheeze maine aapko abhi video meet pe sab cheeze samjha di ki ye ye cheeze hain, jo jo cheeze dekho aapke competitor bhi dikhaye.

Kaun kaisa kaisa buylead use kar raha hai, kitna kitna inquiry aa raha hai aur aapko kitna aa raha hai. Dikhaye sari cheeze dikhai.

Ab dekho jo cheeze change karni hai, aapke catalog se related kuch kuch categories hain sir, jo jo cheeze maine aapke kuch changes kari hain, jo category apne aap aur nahi deal karte ho, woh category bhi hata denge. Aap woh Shivam se main aapko dobara ek baar connect kara dungi kal. Aap woh woh category hata dena. Thik hai?

Usme fir jo aapki remaining hai, usi se related aap buylead consume karo. Aap sir dekho intezar mat karo ki mere paas aayenge, aap khud se filter laga ke use karo. Thik hai?

Khud se filter lagao, use karo, services proper ek se do mahine ab aap jaisa bol rahe hain hum uske according buylead consume karo. Thik?

Yahi cheez maine aapko boli hai, bas yahi cheez karna hai. Baki sir fir main aapse connect karungi, 15 din baad main fir aapse connect karti hu 10-15 din baad, aap mujhe batana kaisa buylead aa raha hai, kaisa consume ho raha hai. Thik?

Customer: Nahi madam, mera nivedan ye hai ki aapne ye kaha ki bhai aap use nahi kar rahe. Humne ye keh raha hai, mera nivedan ye hai ki aap hamare account mein jaiye aur ye dekhiye bhai aaj hamare paas aapne aapke IndiaMART ke dwara kaun kaun si leade bheji hain jo humne use nahi ki. Ab kehne ka matlab aap ye to bata, ye to bata dijiye bhai aaj kaun kaun si lead aapne use nahi ki. Aapne aaj aapne. Accha. Aaj aapne koi bhi buylead use kari hai? Koi buylead consume kari hai? Koi buylead consume nahi kari aapne.

Executive: Aapke to woh jo bhejte, koi bhejta na aap ye maan lo koi hota to. Ab kehne ka matlab ye hai maan lo koi hai hi nahi kaam ki to kya kare batao?

Customer: Sir maine aaj aapko subah hi abhi jab aapse isse pehle call li thi, us call pe bhi maine aapko bataya tha ki ye ye lead aayi hai aapke paas.

Aap ek kaam karo, aapne apne is phone, aap phone se chalate ho ya laptop se chalate ho? Abhi to aap mere se phone se jude the video meet pe ya laptop se jude the?

Executive: To nahi phone pe hi, phone pe hi.

Customer: Phone pe jude the, phone pe jab aap apni lead open karte ho, lead wala option buylead wala, waha pe recent pe aapne lead nahi dekhi? Recent pe lead pe jao.

Executive: Re-recent, recent kar liya lo. Ab ispe dekho main wohi wohi. PVC ceiling wall panel, quantity 10 by 10, 10 square feet. Ab ye, ye hai woh. Ab isme ye hai maan lo. Jinwana, Jinwana. Jinwana. Rajasthan. Ab isme hamari wall se aa rahi hai, isko chalo ye karte hain. Ab ye koi kaam ka hi nahi hai, ye ye hai maan lo ye kya hai? Ab hamare paas sale bel phool ka kaam hota hai. Ab ye hota hai UP.

Selling wall panel.

Abhi UPVC, UPVC, UPVC kaai hote sir humko samajh mein nahi aata. Ab ye kya hai?

Customer: UPVC alag hota hai.

Executive: Haan. Ab ab fir aage chalte hain dekho. Ab hamare paas. White marble garden Tulsi stand, Tulsi stand ye hamare kaam ka nahi hai. Tulsi marble point ye hamare kaam ka nahi hai. Aur ab hamare paas dekho aapko thoda aapka samay to barbaad ho raha hai. PVC wall panel. Quantity che piece, PVC ka aa raha hai, PVC kya hoti hai? PVC wall panel 13 is piece. Ab ye PVC ye hai maan lo koi plastic ka hota hai kya pata nahi. Tulsi point 15 by 15 inch. Hmm hmm. Aur plastic Tulsi point 5000 piece. Aur fir aa raha hai dekho. Ye bhi. 41 wall panel. Ye aa raha hai six 29 mm polished. Ab ye ye bhi hamare samajh se bahar hai. Aur hmm hmm. Ab dekho aapke Dosa pink stone lamp two piece. Do piece ka, do piece ka order bhej raha hai aur ab usse maan lo main baat bhi kar lunga, meri lead kharab ho jayegi ek to aur usse baat bhi kar lunga to woh yu bolega bhaiya mere paas hi dukaan hai. Jaise Dosa ka main Dosa ka dene wala hu to Dosa ka pink stone stand stone lamp bol raha hai. Woh ab main usse pehle isko contact buyer now, usse click karunga to uska number aa jayega mere paas. Aapko main samajh gaya, samajh gaya sir. Aapka dekho aisa nahi hai ki buylead hai nahi hai. Main ek kaam karti hu. Jo dekho kam aa rahi hai sir buylead lekin aisa nahi ki buylead hai nahi aur aapka ek hi related nahi hai na, upar jo filter option aata hai. Us filter option mein upar search ke option mein apne category se related apna category dalo aur tab search karo. Aur search karke dekho leads aayengi. Baki main Shivam ko bolti hu ki kuch aapki category se related kuch buylead hai to aapko whatsapp pe bhej de. Directly. Thik hai? Aap dekho aap direct whatsapp se consume kar lena. Aapko main meri samasya aapko bata raha hu jaise ab ye aa raha hai marble round stone lamp post outdoor 10 hai 10 hai. Sir aap mujhe, sir aap mujhe aise batao ki. Mujhe nahi. Sir mujhe nahi dikh rahi hai na. Mujhe Brijlal ji aise nahi aap nahi batao ki kaun kaun sa aa raha hai. Main aapko ek kaam karti hu, aapko directly sari cheeze sir maine aapko video meet pe bhi itni der se aur pehle bhi call pe samjhai ki kya kya main kar sakti hu, woh woh cheeze hum change karke dobara se karte hain. Abhi aapko aapko filter option use karna hai sabse zyada pehle. Jis bhi category mein aap use kar rahe ho woh sari category upar upar search mein likho waha pe filter mein. Filter lagao us us category mein dal ke search karo aur woh woh aati rahegi fir usse related. Kya bole kya lagaya filter? Filter option aata hai na upar hi aa raha hoga left hand side pe. Nahi hamara isme dekho ye ye aata hai, recent recent click karenge. To ab isme aa gaya. India, India karte hain, India kar liya. Haan India kar do, haan. Aur ab aapke product se related. Product se related aa jayega woh apna usme ab unhone ye aapke dwara ye bataya tha bhai aap ye block ko block block kar liya karo. Woh block wala kar dete hain hum. Usme ye block block wala kar liya isme sara chat ke aa jayega. Ab isme aa gaya marble round stone pole lamp post. Fir lamp post aa raha hai. Round isme marble round aur PVC selling wall panel aa raha hai. Aur apna ye marble Tulsi point aa raha hai. Ab usme ab ye hamara ko kehne ka matlab dekho hamara sochne ye hai ki bhai isme koi aayat koi to use kare. Ab main aaj use, chalo ab main aaj use kar leta hu. Lekin kya karu isme mere layak to hai hi nahi. Ab dekho main main dekh liya. Grenade stand pillar hai, grenade stone pillar hai two piece, ye hamare matlab ka nahi hai. Fir aa PVC fault wall panel ye bhi matlab ka nahi hai. Aur ek minute wall panel 250 square foot kanara ye Haryana ye bhi ye bhi jis mein iski photo dekhte hain to isme kehne ka matlab ye hai isme bel phool ka koi nahi hai. Aur wall panel 1000 feet ab isko bhi chalo woh kar lete hain to ye ye bhi hamara woh nahi hai. Ye ye bol raha hai ACC wall panel. A A double C wall panel. Ek ab ye A double C wall panel kya hota hai jabki hamara phool phool patti ka bel hota hai, sand stone ka nahi hai. Ab kya karu isme humko dukh to ye ho raha hai ye hai maan lo aap keh rahe ki aap daily use nahi karte. Kya kare ab hamari lead ko bigade to kya matlab nikala? Ab ek bhi nahi hai. Maine isme isme ab dekho meri meri chalo mere ko ek lead to bonus milti hai 10 saptaah mein milti hai. Kya karu aaj aap aaj hi aaj ke according ab kal main call karunga sala aapne use kyu nahi kiya? Kya karu isme hai hi nahi koi. Mere se related koi hai hi nahi. Kya click karu? Hello. Sir aapka wahi wahi to category main catalog mein changes kar rahi hu na. Yaha se category mein kuch changes wagera karenge baki uske baad use kar kyuki main aapka buylead ab ya main aapke phone se aapka na scroll karke aapko filter karke dobara se ek baar aapko batati hu ki kya kya cheeze hain. Aur yaha se humne kuch kuch cheeze sir aapki change kari hain aapke samne video meet pe kuch kuch ab main aur isme category se related karungi kyuki search mein option mein jaake agar aapki buylead se related aapko lead hi na aaye to ye ho nahi sakta sir. Maine aapko aapke competitor bhi dikhaye jo jo buylead woh jis jis category mein use kar rahe hain, aapko bhi aa rahi hai aap ek baar ek kaam karna. Ek baar apna jo app hai usko logout karke dobara se login kar lena. Baki maine Shivam ko bola hai sir ki aapko buylead bhejega whatsapp pe ek baar woh buylead bhej raha hai. Ek baar ek baar dobara logout karke apne app ko IndiaMART ke app ko logout karke login kar lena dobara. Aur maine Shivam ko whatsapp pe aapko bola hai buylead bhejane ke liye woh aapko whatsapp pe aapke related product ki buylead bhej raha hai. Aap waha se check karo. Aur group bana rahe hain hum matlab usme main bhi rahungi, Shivam bhi hai aur aap bhi rehna. Hum directly buylead bhej rahe hain aapke aapke usse related. Dekho aap consume karke kya nikal raha hai kya hai fir aap mujhe uska feedback batana whatsapp pe hi reply kar dena. Thik hai? Ye number aapka ye is number pe bata do. Hum hum group bana rahe hain. Group bana rahe hain hum group bana rahe hain us group mein aap bhi rahenge main bhi rahungi Shivam bhi rahega. Hum group bana rahe hain usme to directly aap usme whatsapp pe hi main bhi rahungi to aap mujhe batate rehna hum bhejte rahenge kuch kuch jab jab dekho sir regular to hum bhi nahi bhej sakte. Aapko ek do din ek do din hafte mein bhejenge aur baki ke do teen din aap use karo directly. Thik hai? Dekhte hain sir kuch na kuch result nikalenge aisa nahi hai ki nahi hai. Sir meri samasya aaj ko ya chalo aap change kar denge lekin main to aapko meri samasya ye bata raha hu aaj main kya use karu? Mere paas koi mere se related Aaj aapko use karne ke liye main buylead bhej rahi hu sir. Aaj aapko use karne ke liye main buylead bhej rahi hu whatsapp pe. Thik hai? Aap aap tak baat pahunchane ka matlab ye hai ki hamare paas hamare ye kya hai inka solution ko jabki aapke staff ke logo ko sabko bata diya maine. Jo main aapko keh raha hu. Samajh gaya, samajh gaya main. Aapke staff ke logo ne nahi to ab tak kiya hai. Main kar rahi hu ab pata nahi aap kar do to hamare liye to aap bhi bhagwan honge. Are nahi nahi sir aise mat boliye main apne side se bilkul try karti hu. Main dukhi hoke keh raha hu main aap hamare aap hamara solution kar denge to aap hamare bhagwan se aur kya kam kahungi aap? Kyuki humko vyapar mein sir bhagwan hota hai jisse humko roti milti hai, daal roti milti hai jisse jo ho rahi hai ab hamara to ye hai bhai humne to yu kiya tha bhai hamara humne 35000 kharch kiye chalo 35000 ka to ab tak aata hamare bache hamare bache humse dawa mangte kya kiya tumne? Tumne 35000 lagaaya uska 35000 ab hazar ka bhi mila kya humne nahi mila bhai. Samajh gaya sir. Ye ab dekho aap isme jitna solution ho sake kar do. Humko humne aapke aur iske alawa hum kya kahe batao? Hum aapke hamara uddesh ye nahi hai aapke ladna hai, hum aapko gussa karna hai, humko kya matlab hai? Aap bhi yaha do rupya dekho aap bhi naukri karne aaye ho hum bhi yaha vyapar karne aaya humko kya matlab hai? Hello. Sahi baat hai sir, sahi baat hai sir. Thik hai madam iska solution kar do main aapse request bhi fir request kar raha hu. Nahi haan sir bilkul aap aise mat boliye ki hum solution karne mein hum to refund ke liye refund ke liye to dukhi hoke keh rahe hain aaj refund karwa do hamara aur kya kare? Sir main aapka point samajh gayi haan bilkul. Baki aapki na sir ek ticket open hui hai mere paas yaha se. Brijlal ji usko main band kar deti hu baki maine aapko jo bola hai aap buylead consume karna main aapko fir 10-12 din mein dobara connect karungi. Tab dekhte hain kya hai result aap mujhe batana. Aapka is number pe. Haan main directly haan aap mujhe kar sakte ho directly main aapka is number pe nahi main aapko apne number se whatsapp kar rahi hu. Thik hai woh number aap save kar lena group mein whatsapp hum kar rahe hain group mein usme mera bhi number hai direct Shivam ka bhi number hai aap hum dono ko hi direct call karna jab bhi koi dikkat ho. Thik hai? Baki main aapko ye jo aapki ticket open hai woh aap band kar deti hu aapke paas mail pe sir mere liye feedback ke liye ek aayega usko please yes kar dena. Thik hai? Thik hai sir? Thik. Thik hai. Okay sir, thank you sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting relevant buyleads.

- Customer is unable to use the leads.

- Customer is unhappy with the service.



Resolution:

- Executive explained how to use filters.

- Executive will create a WhatsApp group.

- Executive will send buyleads on WhatsApp.

- Executive will close the open ticket.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to log out and log in again.

- Customer to check WhatsApp for buyleads.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, refund, filters, whatsapp
